command_group: az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule

commands.name: az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule create
commands.syntax:
az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule create --collection-name
                                                              --config-name
                                                              --manager-name
                                                              --name
                                                              --resource-group
                                                              [--description]
                                                              [--destination]
                                                              [--next-hop]
examples: az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule create --config-name TestNetworkManagerConfig --manager-name TestNetworkManager --collection-name TestNetworkManagerCollection --name TestNetworkManagerRule --resource-group "rg1" --destination {"destination_address":"10.0.0.0/16","type":"AddressPrefix"} --next-hop {"next_hop_type":"VirtualNetworkGateway"}

commands.name: az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule delete
commands.syntax:
az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule delete [--collection-name]
                                                              [--config-name]
                                                              [--ids]
                                                              [--manager-name]
                                                              [--name]
                                                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                              [--resource-group]
                                                              [--subscription]
                                                              [--yes]
examples: az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule delete --config-name TestNetworkManagerConfig --manager-name TestNetworkManager --collection-name TestNetworkManagerCollection --name TestNetworkManagerRule --resource-group "rg1" -y

commands.name: az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule list
commands.summary: List all network manager routing configuration routing rules.
commands.syntax:
az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule list --collection-name
                                                            --config-name
                                                            --manager-name
                                                            --resource-group
                                                            [--max-items]
                                                            [--next-token]
                                                            [--skip-token]
                                                            [--top]
examples: az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule list --config-name TestNetworkManagerConfig --manager-name TestNetworkManager --collection-name TestNetworkManagerCollection --resource-group "rg1"

commands.name: az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule show
commands.summary: Get a network manager routing configuration routing rule.
commands.syntax:
az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule show [--collection-name]
                                                            [--config-name]
                                                            [--ids]
                                                            [--manager-name]
                                                            [--name]
                                                            [--resource-group]
                                                            [--subscription]
examples: az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule show --config-name TestNetworkManagerConfig --manager-name TestNetworkManager --collection-name TestNetworkManagerCollection --name TestNetworkManagerRule --resource-group "rg1"

commands.name: az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule update
commands.syntax:
az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule update [--add]
                                                              [--collection-name]
                                                              [--config-name]
                                                              [--description]
                                                              [--destination]
                                                              [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                              [--ids]
                                                              [--manager-name]
                                                              [--name]
                                                              [--next-hop]
                                                              [--remove]
                                                              [--resource-group]
                                                              [--set]
                                                              [--subscription]
examples: az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule update --config-name TestNetworkManagerConfig --manager-name TestNetworkManager --collection-name TestNetworkManagerCollection --name TestNetworkManagerRule --resource-group "rg1" --description "test"

commands.name: az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az network manager routing-config rule-collection rule wait [--collection-name]
                                                            [--config-name]
                                                            [--created]
                                                            [--custom]
                                                            [--deleted]
                                                            [--exists]
                                                            [--ids]
                                                            [--interval]
                                                            [--manager-name]
                                                            [--name]
                                                            [--resource-group]
                                                            [--subscription]
                                                            [--timeout]
                                                            [--updated]
